title: Auth Bypass in Example Corp
description: Discovered Authentication bypass via parameter manipulation affecting Example Corp. The application does not properly sanitize user input, allowing an attacker to inject malicious payloads that are executed by the application.
impact: An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication mechanisms and access restricted functionality.
reproduction_steps: Observe that the payload is executed

Payload: See steps

remediation: Review authentication logic thoroughly. Implement multi-factor authentication. Use secure session management and properly validate all authentication tokens.
